channel.title: Featured on NewsStreet
channel.description: Recent content in Featured on NewsStreet

item.title: 7 Startups Join Mastercard Program to Make Cryptocurrency More Accessible
item.description: 7 Startups Join Mastercard Program to Make Cryptocurrency More Accessible Payments giant Mastercard has added seven startups to its Start Path program to make cryptocurrencies more accessible.

item.title: Elon Musk visits Monterrey, Nuevo León, Mexico & chats with officials
item.description: Elon Musk visits Monterrey, Nuevo León, Mexico & chats with officials Tesla CEO Elon Musk took a trip to Nuevo León, Mexico, this weekend, where he was spotted talking with a state official and the wife of Governor Samuel García Sepulveda, Mariana Rodríguez.

item.title: Did NATO Plan A Pre-Emptive Strike On Russia
item.description: Did NATO Plan A Pre-Emptive Strike On Russia Polaris 21 - The French Maritime Exercise that saw participation of 24 ships, one submarine, 65 aircraft and 6000 personnel with partners from Europe and USA The post Did NATO Plan A Pre-Emptive Strike On Russia appeared first on N4M (News4masses).
